TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TokenValidationException extends System.Exception
Public MustInherit Class TokenValidationException Inherits Exception
public ref class TokenValidationException abstract : Exception

summary.span: Define la clase base para todas las excepciones de validación de tokens de identidad de cliente. El clase es aplicable para los clientes que estén destinados a Exchange Online y versiones de Exchange a partir de Exchange Server 2013.

span.span: Defines the base class for all client identity token validation exceptions.The class is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.
